requirements_en.minimum: 2.3.3 and up

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium Dual-Core CPU E5700 @ 2.00Ghz/AMD Athlon II X2 250 Processor 2.01Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATi Radeon HD2400 pro or NVIDIA Geforce 8 Series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel CoreTM I3-3210 CPU @ 3.20Ghz (4 Cpus) /AMD Phenom II X4 960T 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7790 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 with minimum 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
